post.body: Sadly, that's probably true. Everyone's to blame.
I'm just saying that I'm not so sure who the "terrorists" are anymore. See the body counts: http://www.ifamericansknew.org
What tier is that? :-)
Conservatives (and content megacorps) are desperate to change the Internet so that they can control the message. Don't let them.
Thanks for the reminder!
BTW, I can recommend Ayaan Hirsi Ali's autobiography: http://tinyurl.com/3dp8tj She doesn't recommend cultural relativism.
Dutch left now okay with criticizing immigrants who break Dutch laws: http://tinyurl.com/9el4d3 Good for them.
Is Zionism now like smoking? I don't like it, it's clearly unhealthy, people die of it, and it's becoming socially unacceptable.
For photographers looking to challenge themselves: http://www.dpreview.com/challenges/
Charged with "Interest in Chemistry": http://tinyurl.com/86mfb2 Stupid.
Oh, please don't: http://tinyurl.com/8tpj5a
How is this not considered state-sponsored terrorism? http://www.reddit.com/goto?id=7lxaj Oh, right, they're our allies. Sickening.
Why do I feel like we're being robbed slowly, but continuously? http://www.reddit.com/goto?id=7lzce
No. If you're worried about your kids on the Internet, turn off the computer. It's that simple. http://www.reddit.com/goto?id=7lxdc

I am crazy with the cooking this holiday.

Ham, yams, green beans, buttermilk biscuits. I love a good holiday.
